instructions: To add a custom trait, copy the blank template below and fill in the details. Make sure to follow the structure precisely.

template.name: Custom Trait Name
template.requirement: Any specific requirement for the trait, or leave empty if none
template.description: A detailed description of what the trait does under normal circumstances
template.wild_wasteland_description: A detailed description of what the trait does if the Wild Wasteland option is selected, or leave empty if none
template.effect: The specific effects of the trait under normal circumstances
template.wild_wasteland_effect: The specific effects of the trait if the Wild Wasteland option is selected, or leave empty if none
template.notes: Any additional notes or special instructions, or leave empty if none

General Traits.name: A Moment of Respite
General Traits.description: You're a natural when it comes to lifting spirits. Whenever you and any other player characters rest, you play music, sing a song, recount a story, or give an inspiring speech. You and each other player character resting gain temporary stamina points equal to your Charisma score. However, you and each player character's group stealth is reduced by 2 so long as you are within 500 feet of them.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: The amount of temporary stamina points gained is instead double your Charisma score, but your party’s group stealth is reduced by 5 so long as you’re in the party.

General Traits.name: Brawny
General Traits.description: You gain a bonus to your maximum hit points equal to your level. However your maximum stamina points are reduced by a number equal to your level.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to this trait’s effects; you gain a bonus to your maximum hit points equal to your level. However your maximum stamina points are reduced by a number equal to your level.
General Traits.effect: bonus to your maximum hit points equal to your level. However your maximum stamina points are reduced by a number equal to your level.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: bonus to your maximum hit points equal to your level. However your maximum stamina points are reduced by a number equal to your level.
General Traits.notes: (Wild Wasteland stacks on top of the normal, when Wild wasteland is active show both)

General Traits.name: Bruiser
General Traits.description: A little slower, but a little bigger. You may not hit as often, but they will feel it when you do! When you damage a creature from an attack with a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage, or an unarmed attack; the damage is increased by an additional damage dice. However any unarmed or melee weapon attack you make costs 1 more action points.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Option 1: When you damage a creature from an attack with a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage, or an unarmed attack; the damage is increased by 3. However any unarmed or melee weapon attack you make costs 2 more action points. Option 2, true to the original: Your Strength score is increased by 2, however your maximum action points are reduced by 2.

General Traits.name: Built to Destroy
General Traits.description: The flamer that burns twice as bright burns half as long. Any damage you deal with a weapon is increased by 1. However, whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll with a weapon; the weapon gains two levels of decay instead of one.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Any damage you deal with a weapon is increased by 2. However, whenever you attack with a weapon, it gaines Breakable (see pg #).

General Traits.name: Claustrophobia
General Traits.description: You have a fear of enclosed spaces. The effects from your Party Nerve are doubled while you are outside (IE: whenever you roll combat sequence and gain temporary stamina points, you gain double the amount and whenever you roll a death save, you double your party nerve bonus.) However, you do not gain the benefits of your Party Nerve while indoors, underground, or otherwise not outside.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: True to the original: You gain advantage on all ability and skill checks while outside, but disadvantage on all ability and skill checks while indoors, underground, or otherwise not outside.

General Traits.name: Do No Harm
General Traits.description: “Primum non nocere”, you’ve taken the Hippocratic oath and intend to heal others in the wasteland instead of hurting them. Whenever you use a first aid kit, stimpak, perk, or ability to restore hit points to another creature, you restore an additional 1 hit point. Whenever you attack another creature and damage them, the damage is reduced by 1 to a minimum of 1.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to the trait's effects; whenever you spend 6 AP to roll a Medicine check on a dying creature to return them to 1 hit point, the check automatically succeeds. However, if you ever damage another creature from an attack you made against them, and this damage kills them; you lose all abilities from this trait.
General Traits.notes: (Wild Wasteland stacks on top of the normal, when Wild wasteland is active show both)

General Traits.name: Early Bird
General Traits.description: Early to bed, early to rise, makes a ghoul stealthy, wealthy, and want to kill those guys! You can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to any ability or skill check you make from the hours of 6am to 12pm. However, you gain an additional level of fatigue whenever you fail an Endurance check to resist sleep.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: True to the original: You have a +2 to all skills in the morning (6am to 12pm), but a -1 during the night (6pm to 6am).

General Traits.name: Embolden
General Traits.description: You know how to prepare others for the worst, and to inspire the soul. Whenever you roll combat sequence, each other player character gains advantage on their first attack roll they make on their turn. However, if any player characters critically hit on their first attack after rolling combat sequence, they do not deal any extra damage.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever you roll combat sequence, each other player character gains advantage on their first two attack rolls they make on their turn. However, if any player characters critically hit on their first or second attack after rolling combat sequence, they do not deal any extra damage.

General Traits.name: Enhancement Reliant
General Traits.description: You're accustomed to the rush of chemical enhancements or the electrodes of programs. If you are addicted, you lose the condition whenever you rest for at least 8 hours. However, you have disadvantage on any Endurance check to resist becoming addicted.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: If you are addicted, you lose the condition after 1 hour. However, you always become addicted after using a Chem or Robot Overclock Program.

General Traits.name: Enhancement Resistant
General Traits.description: Your body works hard to be resistant to addiction. You have advantage on any Endurance check to resist becoming addicted. However, whenever you use a Chem or Robot Overclock Program, the benefits last for half as long as the listed duration.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: You are immune to the addicted condition. However, whenever you use a Chem or Robot Overclock Program, the benefits last for a maximum of one round regardless of its listed duration.

General Traits.name: Feral
General Traits.description: You’ve survived in the heart of the savage wasteland. Whenever you deal damage with an unarmed or melee weapon attack, you deal an extra 2 damage. However, you do not gain the benefits from Party Nerve.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to the traits effects; whenever you spend at least 6 action points to move, you immediately gain 2 action points. However, you have disadvantage on all Barter and Speech skill checks. And, regardless of your Charisma ability score, you are considered to have a 4 in Charisma for any perk requirement.

General Traits.name: Finesse
General Traits.description: Whenever you critically hit with a weapon, the critical hit damage multiplier either increases by 1 or the damage dice increases by 1. However, whenever you make an attack roll the total is reduced by 1.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever you critically hit with a weapon, the critical hit damage multiplier either increases by 2 or the damage dice increases by 2. However, whenever you make an attack roll the total is reduced by 2.

General Traits.name: Gifted
General Traits.description: You have more innate abilities than most, so you have not spent as much time honing your skills. Your Carry Load increases by 10, your Combat Sequence bonus increases by 1, you can use Discount an additional time per rest, your Party Nerve increases by 1, and you have an additional Karma Cap. However, you decrease all your skill check bonuses by 3.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Your Carry Load increases by 20, your Combat Sequence bonus increases by 2, you can use Discount two additional times per rest, your Party Nerve increases by 2, and you have two additional Karma Caps. However, you decrease all your skill check bonuses by 6.
General Traits.effect: Carry Load +10, Combat Sequence +1, +1 Karma Cap, All Skills -3
General Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Carry Load +20, Combat Sequence +2, +2 Karma Cap, All Skills -6

General Traits.name: Godspeed
General Traits.description: While your stamina points are equal to 0, you can choose to gain one additional action point at the start of your turn. However, if you do so, your AC and DT are each decreased by 2.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: While your stamina points are equal to 0, you can choose to gain 2 additional action points at the start of your turn. However, if you do, you do not subtract your DT to any damage dealt to your hit points and your AC is equal to 8.

General Traits.name: Good Natured
General Traits.description: You're Good Natured at heart, more prone to solving problems with your mind than violence. Regardless of your Charisma ability score, you are considered to have an additional two points in your Charisma ability score for any perk requirement. (For example, if your Charisma ability score is equal to 5, with this trait it would be considered a 7 for perk requirements). However, regardless of your Agility and Strength ability scores, you are considered to have two points reduced for any Agility or Strength perk requirement.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Regardless of your Charisma ability score, you are considered to have a 10 in your Charisma ability score for any perk requirement. However, regardless of your Agility and Strength ability scores, you are considered to have a 4 for any Agility or Strength perk requirement.

General Traits.name: Hardened by the Earth
General Traits.description: You’ve known long days and hard work, you have advantage whenever you roll an Endurance check to resist a level of Hunger or Fatigue. However, you fall unconscious if you reach 8 levels of Hunger or Fatigue instead of 10.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to the trait's effects; whenever your hit points or stamina points increase from leveling up, you gain an extra point in each. However, the negative effects from levels of Hunger and Fatigue are doubled.
General Traits.notes: (Wild Wasteland stacks on top of the normal, when Wild wasteland is active show both)

General Traits.name: Hoarder
General Traits.description: Your Carry Load increases by 25. However, you have disadvantage on all ability checks, skill checks, and attack rolls while you’re not carrying at least 50 load of any combination of weapons, armor, ammunition, explosives, chems, food, drink, or junk items.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: You are immune to the Encumbered condition, however whenever your Carry Load falls below your maximum, you gain a level of fatigue.

General Traits.name: Hot Blooded
General Traits.description: While your stamina points are equal to 0, you gain the following effects: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with any weapon, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. Whenever you make an attack roll, subtract 2 from the result.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to this trait's effects: When your stamina points are equal to 0; the damage you deal from any attack roll is increased by 5. However, you have disadvantage on all your attack rolls while your stamina points are equal to 0.

General Traits.name: Jinxed
General Traits.description: The good thing is that everyone around you has more critical failures in combat, the bad thing is - so do you! Whenever any creature in the game makes an attack roll, the chance to automatically miss the attack and for the weapon to gain a level of decay is increased by 1. (Example: If only one player character has taken this perk; then if any creature makes an attack roll and rolls a 1 or 2 on the dice, they automatically miss and their weapon gains a level of decay. However, if your karma cap is flipped you may flip it back over.)
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever any creature in the game makes an attack roll, the chance to automatically miss the attack is increased by 2.

General Traits.name: Long Days, Long Nights
General Traits.description: You’re accustomed to straining your body and enduring physical work, whenever your stamina points increase from leveling up, you gain an extra point. However, you gain an additional level of fatigue whenever you fail an Endurance check to resist sleep.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to the trait's effects; whenever your stamina points increase from leveling up, you gain another extra point (for a total of 2). However, whenever you regain stamina points from any rest that isn’t sleep, you regain a fourth of your maximum stamina points instead of half.
General Traits.effect: Stamina points on level-up increase by one
General Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Stamina points on level-up increase by one(Total of 2)
General Traits.notes: (Wild Wasteland stacks on top of the normal, when Wild wasteland is active show both)

General Traits.name: Long Roads
General Traits.description: You’ve traveled far and wide and know how best to handle the open road. When you and any other player characters travel at a fast pace, you can move an additional two miles per hour. However, if you do, at the end of each hour you and each other player character must succeed a DC 12 Endurance check or gain a level of fatigue. The DC increases by 2 for any player character who succeeds this check.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: When you and any other player characters travel at a fast pace, you can move an additional five miles per hour. However, if you do, at the end of each hour you and each other player character gains a level of fatigue.

General Traits.name: Loose Cannon
General Traits.description: Whenever you spend action points to throw an explosive, you spend 1 less action point to a minimum of 3. However, you can throw them only up to half their listed range.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to this trait's effects: Whenever you throw an explosive, and it deals damage to another player character's hit points, the damage is doubled for all other creatures that aren’t player characters.

General Traits.name: Night Person
General Traits.description: You’re more of a night-person. You can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to any ability or skill check you make from the hours of 6pm to 6am. However, you gain an additional level of fatigue whenever you fail an Endurance check to resist sleep.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: True to the original: You have a -1 to all skills in the morning (6am to 12pm), but a +2 during the night (6pm to 6am).

General Traits.name: One Hander
General Traits.description: Whenever you make an attack roll with a weapon that only requires one hand, add 2 to the result. However, whenever you make an attack roll with a weapon that requires two-hands, subtract 2 from the result.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever you deal damage from an attack with a weapon that only requires one hand, add 2 to the total. However, whenever you deal damage from an attack with a weapon that requires two-hands, subtract 2 from the total.

General Traits.name: One in a Million
General Traits.description: You're not particularly lucky or unfortunate, but when lightning strikes, it strikes hard! When you critically hit with an attack roll from any weapon, roll a d20. If you roll a 20 on this d20 roll then you automatically hit and roll the extra damage listed in the weapon table, however this damage is quadrupled. If you do not roll a 20, your attack still hits but does not deal any critical hit damage.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: When you critically hit with an attack roll from any weapon, roll a d20. If you roll a 20 on this d20 roll then roll another d20. If you roll a 20 on the third d20 roll then you automatically hit and roll the extra damage listed in the weapon table, however this damage is octupled.

General Traits.name: Persistent
General Traits.description: Whenever you flip a Karma Cap to re-roll a Skill check, you make the roll at advantage. However, your Karma Caps no longer flip back over whenever you roll a 1 on a d20.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever you flip a Karma Cap to reroll an Ability check, Skill check, or attack roll; you make the roll at advantage. However, you start each game with one of your Karma Caps flipped.

General Traits.name: Proper Maintenance
General Traits.description: You know how to keep good care of your equipment. Whenever any of your weapons or armor have no levels of decay, the first level of decay they gain is ignored. However, your weapons and armor become non-functional when they have 8 levels of decay instead of 10.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever any of your weapons or armor have one or two levels of decay, the negative effects are ignored. However, your weapons and armor become non-functional when they have 5 levels of decay instead of 10.
General Traits.effect: Reduce equipment Decay check boxes to 8
General Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Reduce Equipment decay check boxes to 5

General Traits.name: Recluse
General Traits.description: You’ve spent more time honing your skills than learning new things. Instead of gaining a perk at 1st level, five different Skill modifiers of your choice increase by 2.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Instead of gaining a perk at 1st and 2nd level, all your Skill modifiers increase by 2.

General Traits.name: Sweeten the Deal
General Traits.description: You know how to strike a bargain and make anything worth your time. Whenever you use your Discount ability, the percentage of caps off the selected item is tripled. However, all items cost 10% more for you.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Whenever you use your Discount ability, the percentage of caps off the selected item is sextupled. However, all items cost 25% more for you.

General Traits.name: The Sight Beyond
General Traits.description: You often hear the whispers of the great beyond, receiving paranormal visions of prophecy. When you finish a rest that lasts at least 8 hours, you may roll a d20 and record the result, this is your Sight roll. With this Sight roll you can replace any attack roll, skill check, or ability check made by you or a creature that you can see. Once you use this Sight roll, you cannot use it again until you rest again for at least 8 hours. However, you start each game with one of your Karma Caps flipped.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: You may make two Sight rolls after you rest for at least 8 hours, but your Karma Caps no longer flips if you ever roll a 1 on a d20.

General Traits.name: Vigilant Watch
General Traits.description: You’ve learned not to hesitate in moments of peril. Whenever combat sequence is determined, your turn placement is automatically put before the creature in the turn order placed before you that isn’t a player character, regardless of their roll. However, your Combat Sequence bonus is reduced by 1.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Your turn placement is automatically put before the previous two creatures in the turn order that aren’t player characters, regardless of their roll. However, you have disadvantage on Combat Sequence rolls and your bonus is reduced by 2.
General Traits.effect: Combat Sequence bonus is reduced by 1.
General Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Combat Sequence bonus is reduced by 2.

Ghoul Traits.name: Activated Actinides
Ghoul Traits.description: Through some mutation, you haven’t fully ghoulified. You can heal the full amount from stimpaks and you can use healing powder. However, you are no longer immune to radiation and its effects, but you have advantage on any Radiation checks and are resistant to radiation damage.
Ghoul Traits.wild_wasteland_description: In addition to the traits effects; Your Healing Rate is increased by 2. However, whenever you succeed a Radiation check, your Radiation DC increases by 4 instead of 2.
Ghoul Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Your Healing Rate is increased by 2.
Ghoul Traits.notes: (Wild Wasteland stacks on top of the normal, when Wild wasteland is active show both)

Human Traits.name: Fast Metabolism
Human Traits.description: Your metabolic rate is increased. Your Healing Rate is increased by 2. However, your Radiation DC is increased by 3.
Human Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Your Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level. However, whenever you succeed a radiation check, your Radiation DC increases by 4 instead of 2.
Human Traits.effect: Your Healing Rate is increased by 2. However, your Radiation DC is increased by 3.
Human Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Your Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level.

Robot Traits.name: Cheaper Parts
Robot Traits.description: You're made from a more accessible and malleable metal. Your Healing Rate is increased by 2. However, your AC is reduced by 1.
Robot Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Your Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level. However, your AC is decreased by 1, and your DT is decreased by 2.
Robot Traits.effect: Your Healing Rate is increased by 2. However, your AC is reduced by 1.
Robot Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level. However, your AC is decreased by 1, and your DT is decreased by 2.

Super Mutant Traits.name: Onerous Regeneration
Super Mutant Traits.description: Your metabolic rate is increased. Your Healing Rate is increased by 2. However, your maximum stamina points are reduced by a number equal to your level.
Super Mutant Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Your Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level. However, whenever you regain stamina points from sleep, you regain half as much.
Super Mutant Traits.effect: Healing Rate is increased by 2, maximum stamina points are reduced by a number equal to your level.
Super Mutant Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level.

Synth Traits.name: Dense Circuitry
Synth Traits.description: Your fragile wiring is more protected, at the cost of input lag. You gain a bonus to your Healing Rate maximum equal to 2. However, your Combat Sequence rolls are decreased by 2.
Synth Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Your Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level. However, your Combat Sequence rolls have disadvantage and are decreased by 4.
Synth Traits.effect: gain a bonus to your Healing Rate maximum equal to 2. However, your Combat Sequence rolls are decreased by 2.
Synth Traits.wild_wasteland_effect: Your Healing Rate is increased by a number equal to your level. However, your Combat Sequence rolls have disadvantage and are decreased by 4.

Special Traits.name: Skilled
Special Traits.requirement: An ability score equal to or lower than 3.
Special Traits.wild_wasteland_description: Prerequisite: One Ability Score equal to 1. Increase one Skill modifier by 5.
